title: Question 1 Point 6
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses, and to score the response.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately respond to the question.

Question F: In line 6-8 (Sed…suis), identify what Aeneas says motivated his actions.

Examples that earn this point include the following:

  • the orders of the gods

  • his piety

The response accurately responds to the question.
